entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:07 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
